name: Roy Tang
text: Didn't I just explain (twice!) that kaya ako nagbabasa ng mga articles and nakikipagdiscussion is to get more information? I'm doing it in order to make a more informed decision, not (just) for fun lol    BTW, since you keep going off on tangents, I might as well make one myself. Please stop mis-spelling analyze that way, it kind of hurts  http://www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=Analize
